text: The London mayoral election, 2008 was on 1 May 2008. It was the third London mayoral election, the first election was held in May 2000 and the second election in June 2004. It was won by the Conservative Party candidate Boris Johnson. Boris Johnson became the second Mayor of London. Category:2008 in England 2008 mayoral election 2008 Category:May 2008 events
title: 2008 London mayoral election
